mean_cn: n. 装配线（生产上一环接一环的），流水线
mean_en: mechanical system in a factory whereby an article is conveyed through sites at which successive operations are performed on it
short_phrase: an assembly line at a factory
sentence: Products are quickly mass-produced on an assembly line.
sentence_trans: 产品很快在装配线上被批量生产出来。
